org.vast.process

Interface IProcessExec

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IProcessChainExec
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractProcessImpl, AggregateProcessImpl, ExecutableChainImpl, ExecutableProcessImpl, PhysicalComponentImpl, PhysicalSystemImpl, SimpleProcessImpl

    public interface IProcessExec

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canRun()
      Check that all needed connections are ready for the process to run in sync mode (not threaded).
      void connectInput(String inputName, String dataPath, DataConnection connection)
      Connects one of this process inputs with the given connection
      void connectOutput(String outputName, String dataPath, DataConnection connection)
      Connects one of this process outputs with the given connection
      void connectParameter(String paramName, String dataPath, DataConnection connection)
      Connects one of this process parameters with the given connection
      void createNewInputBlocks()
      Creates new DataBlock for each input signal
      void createNewOutputBlocks()
      Creates new DataBlock for each output signal
      void dispose()
      Override to dispose of all resources allocated for the process (stop threads, OS resources, etc...) Default method does nothing.
      void execute()
      Execute is typically called several times on a process and should contain all the logic to transform input/parameter values to output values.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        String getName()
        Returns:
        process name

      • init

        void init()
          throws SMLProcessException
        Initialize the process and its internal variables (fixed parameters). This is called only once before the process is executed.
        Throws:
        SMLProcessException

      • execute

        void execute()
             throws SMLProcessException
        Execute is typically called several times on a process and should contain all the logic to transform input/parameter values to output values. This method should be optimized as much as possible.
        Throws:
        SMLProcessException

      • reset

        void reset()
           throws SMLProcessException
        Resets the process (especially asnchronous ones) before it can be run again. This method should properly initialize all process state variables
        Throws:
        SMLProcessException

      • dispose

        void dispose()
        Override to dispose of all resources allocated for the process (stop threads, OS resources, etc...) Default method does nothing.

      • canRun

        boolean canRun()
        Check that all needed connections are ready for the process to run in sync mode (not threaded).
        Returns:
        true if so and false if at least one connection is not ready.

      • createNewOutputBlocks

        void createNewOutputBlocks()
        Creates new DataBlock for each output signal

      • createNewInputBlocks

        void createNewInputBlocks()
        Creates new DataBlock for each input signal

      • run

        void run()
        Process thread run method

      • start

        void start()
           throws SMLProcessException
        Start process thread
        Throws:
        SMLProcessException

      • stop

        void stop()
        Stop process thread gracefully

      • getInputConnections

        List<DataConnectionList> getInputConnections()
        Returns:
        list of input connections to read data from

      • getParamConnections

        List<DataConnectionList> getParamConnections()
        Returns:
        list of parameter connections to read data from

      • getOutputConnections

        List<DataConnectionList> getOutputConnections()
        Returns:
        list of output connections to write data to

      • connectInput

        void connectInput(String inputName,
                String dataPath,
                DataConnection connection)
                  throws SMLProcessException
        Connects one of this process inputs with the given connection
        Parameters:
        inputName - name of input to connect
        dataPath - path of component to connect
        connection - connection object whose destination will be set to the specified component
        Throws:
        SMLProcessException

      • connectOutput

        void connectOutput(String outputName,
                 String dataPath,
                 DataConnection connection)
                   throws SMLProcessException
        Connects one of this process outputs with the given connection
        Parameters:
        outputName - name of output to connect
        dataPath - path of component to connect
        connection - connection object whose source will be set to the specified component
        Throws:
        SMLProcessException

      • connectParameter

        void connectParameter(String paramName,
                    String dataPath,
                    DataConnection connection)
                      throws SMLProcessException
        Connects one of this process parameters with the given connection
        Parameters:
        paramName - name of parameter to connect
        dataPath - path of component to connect
        connection - connection object whose destination will be set to the specified component
        Throws:
        SMLProcessException

      • isInputConnected

        boolean isInputConnected(String inputName)
        Checks if the specified input has one or more connections
        Parameters:
        inputName - name of input
        Returns:
        true if at least one connection is made with the input

      • isOutputConnected

        boolean isOutputConnected(String outputName)
        Checks if the specified output has one or more connections
        Parameters:
        outputName - name of output
        Returns:
        true if at least one connection is made with the output

      • isParamConnected

        boolean isParamConnected(String paramName)
        Checks if the specified parameter has one or more connections
        Parameters:
        paramName - name of parameter
        Returns:
        true if at least one connection is made with the parameter

      • isUsingQueueBuffers

        boolean isUsingQueueBuffers()
        Checks if actual buffered queues are used to connect with this process
        Returns:
        tru if queues are used

      • setUsingQueueBuffers

        void setUsingQueueBuffers(boolean usingQueueBuffers)

      • needSync

        boolean needSync()

      • setAvailability

        void setAvailability(List<DataConnectionList> allConnections,
                   boolean availability)

      • transferData

        void transferData(List<DataConnectionList> allConnections)
